resources.string: Impactor will unroot your device, removing root access and data. Your apps will be erased, and root access removed. Your media files, such as songs, photos, and documents will be preserved.\nThe device will be rebooted during the process, and it can take up to some minutes, depending on your data size; this process will make your device as it has never been modified.

Impactor will wipe your device, removing data and preserving root access. Your apps will be erased, and root access preserved. Your media files, such as songs, photos, and documents will be preserved.\nThe device will be rebooted during the process, and it can take up to some minutes, depending on your data size.

Impactor will unroot your device, removing root access. Your data will be preserved, and root access removed.\nThe device will be rebooted during the process, and it can take up to some minutes. This process will make your device as it has never been modified.
Reboot the device to the bootLoader
Boot the device into Recovery Mode
Your device data will be erased, and the system will be unrooted. If you use Magisk, please refer to its uninstallation process before using Impactor
Root access is not installed (or at least, detected) on your device, so there is nothing to do
Continuing, the unroot process will start. Device data will not be modified. If you use Magisk, please refer to its uninstallation process before using Impactor
Error: Cannot access to external storage
Impactor is unable to read external storage because it hasn\'t got the permission. Please allow it in settings
